snippet: Gov. Deval Patrick proposed changes to prevent another public health disaster like the meningitis outbreak tied to a Framingham company.
abstract: Massachusetts Gov Deval Patrick proposes new laws to strengthen state control of compounding pharmacies in effort to prevent another public health disaster like outbreak of meningitis caused by contaminated drug made in the state.

byline.original: By ABBY GOODNOUGH and DENISE GRADY
byline.contributor: Abby Goodnough reported from Boston, and Denise Grady from New York.

lead_paragraph: Gov. Deval Patrick proposed changes to prevent another public health disaster like the meningitis outbreak tied to a Framingham company.

headline.seo: Massachusetts Plans Stricter Control of Compounding Pharmacies
headline.main: Massachusetts Plans Stricter Control of Compounding Pharmacies
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts Plans Stricter Control of Compounding Pharmacies
